reviewText: Great DVD to show my clients who struggle with emotion regulation.

Great tool in order to learn to cope with anger, sadness, fear and shame! The video is only 26 minutes, but it is worth it. Particularly for clinicians, since you can use it in session for psycho-ed or as hw.
This is a great video to present to clients.  I little dated in its appearance but very good information.  Well worth the cost.
She is an avid reader and asked specifically for this book. We made points and her happy at the same time. Win-Win

Good content and very useful. Could be a little longer for the price.
At 23 minutes....it is very short.
